Deploying machine learning models in pro.COURSE_NAME: Machine Learning Engineering for Production (MLOps) Specialization
Deploying machine learning models in pro.DESCRIPTION: This specialization teaches you how to deploy, monitor, and manage machine learning models in production environments, covering topics like model deployment strategies, CI/CD pipelines for ML, and model monitoring techniques.

The MLOps Engineer Professional Certificate program is designed to equip learners with the skills and knowledge to implement machine learning solutions to enterprise-level problems. It's designed to teach MLOps practices from model building to deployment, monitoring, and maintenance.

MLOps Zoomcamp is a free online course that teaches you how to deploy machine learning models in production. It covers topics such as containerization, continuous integration, and continuous deployment.

Big Data Frameworks.DESCRIPTION: This specialization covers the fundamental concepts and tools for working with big data, including Hadoop, Spark, and MapReduce. It teaches you how to process, analyze, and visualize large datasets using these frameworks.

Big Data Frameworks.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Professional Program in Big Data
Big Data Frameworks.DESCRIPTION: This program provides a comprehensive understanding of big data technologies and techniques, including Hadoop, Spark, Azure HDInsight, and data warehousing. It covers topics such as data ingestion, processing, storage, and analysis.

Big Data Frameworks.COURSE_NAME: Big Data Analytics with Apache Spark
